Annotation: We are morphing so fast that our ability to invent new things outpaces the rate we can civilize them.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: Our greatest invention in the past 200 years was not a particular gadget or tool but the invention of the scientific process itself.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: But as our personal technology is becoming more complex, more codependent upon peripherals, more like a living ecosystem, delaying upgrading is even more disruptive. If you neglect ongoing minor upgrades, the change backs up so much that the eventual big upgrade reaches traumatic proportions.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: Technological life in the future will be a series of endless upgrades.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: In this era of “becoming,” everyone becomes a newbie. Worse, we will be newbies forever. That should keep us humble.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: The link and the tag now make screening the universal library possible, and powerful.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future

Annotation: At this point in our history, sharing something that has not been shared before, or in a new way, is the surest way to increase its value.
Author: Kevin Kelly
Title: The Inevitable: Understanding The 12 Technological Forces That Will Shape Our Future
